name: Kapha
summary: You are enthusiastic, lively, energetic, and creative. You are a born artist. You are spontaneous, changing, and always in a rush. You eat, talk, and walk quickly. You have a lot of energy, but for brief periods of time. You have an irregular and unscheduled lifestyle and don't like plans. You like to travel, new relationships, and new experiences. You are narrow in all areas of your body and have always had difficulties gaining weight. You most often forget to eat and have tendency to malnutrition and constipation. You have cold hands and feet and don't like cold in general. When you're stressed, you become anxious, confused, constipated, fearful, nervous, overwhelmed, and worried. You have an agitated and poor sleep. I have poor attention span and long-term memory. Briefly, you are unpredictable.

name: Pitta
summary: You are intuitive, wise, strategic, confident, and disciplined. You are a born leader and entrepreneur. You are calculated in everything you do and have a well-defined lifestyle and schedule. You are determined, ambitious, and never stop until you achieve what you want. You like being in control and can't stand people telling you what to do. You are frustrated with people who always complain and are lasy. You are self-critical, perfectionist, and judgmental with people around you. You are sharp, symmetrical, and moderate in all areas of your body. You are athletic, active, and enjoy working out. You have an engaging smile and penetrating eyes. You have clear vision on what you want and hardly lose your focus. You have a high metabolism, good digestion, and must eat often, or else you get angry and irritated. You have a tendency to diarrhea and acid reflux. You don't like anything that is hot and spicy. You sleep well, uninterrupted for no more than 8 hours. When you're stressed, you become angry, arrogant, fourious, intolerant, and violent. You enjoy competition. Briefly, you are on fire.

name: Pitta-Kapha
summary: You are peaceful, loving, relaxed, calm, and tolerant. You are a born listener and advisor. You have big hard and love everybody around you, especially your family and close ones. You can become overprotective sometimes. You don't like being in charge. You are stable, consistent, and don't like to change. You enjoy warm, dry, peaceful, comfortable, and silent environments. You hardly get angry. You are pleasant, have a warm voice, and it is a pleasure for people to be around you. You are thick, round, large, and dense in all areas of your body. You have difficulties losing weight. You have a poor metabolism and digestion and tend to feel heavy after meals. You sleep very deep and sound for more than 8 hours and find it hard to get out of bed. You are lasy and like to procrastinate. You are a slow learner, but with very good recall and long-term memory. You tend to become congested and sick quite often. You don't like humidity. When stressed, you isolate yourself, keep all negative emotions within and tend to overeat. Briefly, you are soft.
